name: BEAST SABER
description:
beat saber is a Rhythmic shooter which makes use of your local music files to generate targets that can be shot during the duration of the song which is being played.

but I can`t  afford a VR headset, so I made one for my self

HOW TO PLAY

Upon loading the game press the "Select songs" button to select a song from a list of songs locally stored on your device

Then after the song is fully loaded press the play button to start

Tap the bottom left/Right-hand side of the screen to shoot at the targets as they come at you

MY FIRST GOOD DESCRIPTION :)
